news.title: Jimmy Kimmel pulled from air over Charlie Kirk comments
news.summary: The suspension came after Trump-nominated FCC Chairman Brendan Carr threatened regulatory action against ABC and Disney over Kimmel's comments.

news.title: 55 years ago today: Jimi Hendrix died, aged 27
news.summary: On this day 55 years ago, Jimi Hendrix died in London, aged 27. To mark his anniversary, we're sharing some special reflections on his life and legacy – all selected from interviews in the Hot Press Archives

news.title: Drink The Sea supergroup, including R.E.M's Peter Buck and Barrett Martin, announce Dublin show
news.summary: They will play The Button Factory on December 14.

news.title: Blood Orange: “I think the great joys of all forms of art are the different ways it can be a friend to you"
news.summary: Art-pop maverick Devonté Hynes, aka Blood Orange, discusses his new album Essex Honey – a moving exploration of grief and memory which features everyone from Lorde to Zadie Smith.

news.title: Student Special: Travel Options Beyond The J1
news.summary: Whether it’s pulling espressos in Berlin, teaching English in Tokyo, or fruit-picking under the Australian sun, there are endless opportunities for Irish students to make their summer abroad memorable, even without the J1.

news.title: First trailer released for forthcoming Ozzy Osbourne documentary
news.summary: The film delves into Osbourne's health concerns and final wishes for a farewell show.

news.title: Miley Cyrus announces deluxe edition of Something Beautiful, featuring Lindsey Buckingham, Mick Fleetwood and David Byrne
news.summary: The deluxe edition will drop on Friday, September 19.

news.title: Bernie Sanders says Israel is committing genocide in Gaza
news.summary: He becomes the first US senator to do so.
